item.description:
Thanksgiving Eve is a major party night, the entire downtown will be alive, and I love to dance, so we're going dancing at Wicked Wolf! (formerly the Playwright)

We'll meet at 9pm, hang-out, and at some point get dancing.

The dance room is supposed to open at 9, if you're definitely coming and aren't too shy to "start" a dance floor, I'm happy to meet earlier (8pm?), and get dancing sooner. Let me know, I'll change the Meetup time.

There may be no cover earlier in the night, definitely one as the night goes on. Later in the night, if it gets packed, they may increase the cover.

The music at Wicked Wolf is usually like what you'd hear on 101.3FM

DINNER/BAR CRAWL BEFORE? I probably can't, but if someone else wants to host a restaurant or bars outing, I'll make another Event and we'll sync-up. If no one plans this, I MAY end up downtown earlier to eat anyway. If you want to join, email me your cell and I'll text you if that happens.

HOW TO FIND US: We may hang-out in front first. Regardless, just text me when you're close to the venue to give some time for me to notice your text. If it helps, I'm tall (6'3"). Maybe I'll wear a light-up necklace. I'll try to update this with new details (& send a message) as the date gets closer.

HOST: Jason, cell 203-901-4957 (noisy club, texting probably best)

PARKING: I always find free street parking easily northeast of the green...Temple St, Grove St, etc. Or look at New Haven's parking garage map here
item.how_to_find_us: Text me when you're close to arriving (203-901-4957). Also, I'm tall, 6'3"
item.name: Wed 11/24 - Thanksgiving Eve dancing
